column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Finally at the end of the night
column2: our waiter brought us ice cream to celebrate my friends birthday. This ice cream was UH-MAZING. It's pretty hard to impress me with ice cream just because a.) ice cream is not usually my dessert of choice and b.) I've had a LOT of good ice cream. But this one was very creamy and smooth
column3: and they chilled the tin ice cream dish it came in
column4: which kept the texture and temperature perfect. I highly recommend ordering ice cream as a dessert! You definitely won't regret it.
